test_objective: Validate complexity score correlation with acceptance score (r < -0.80 target)

orchestrator_fix.result: Clean execution with no routing errors

test_wos.title: Configure Redux Toolkit Store Foundation with TypeScript
Implement Discussion View Container with Real-Time State Management
Configure Comprehensive Testing Infrastructure with Jest and Testing Libraries
Complete Documentation, Build Configuration, and Production Packaging

correlation_analysis.interpretation: Higher complexity predicts HIGHER acceptance (opposite of expected)

readability.status: ONLY dimension with variation - drives positive correlation

completeness.status: NO variation - build failures force constant 2/10

test_coverage.status: NO variation - all WOs have 0% coverage

root_causes_identified: Only readability dimension varies (15% weight) - insufficient for validation
Historical r=-0.97 was from different scoring method (not reproducible)

pivot_decision.reason: Validation test fundamentally compromised by broken project baseline
pivot_decision.new_approach: Root cause analysis + dimensional improvement tracking
pivot_decision.abandon: Formula validation until clean baseline available
pivot_decision.focus: Analyze WHY builds fail, not WHETHER formula predicts

next_actions: Analyze build error patterns from 5 PRs
Design static test suite (synthetic or reusable WOs)
Fix proposer based on error patterns
